Statements.Statement: select Distinct A.UserID, UserName from UMS_tblUserAccount A INNER JOIN ( SELECT Code FROM SAFVIET_tblDanhSachQuanLy WHERE [Type] = '1' ) B ON B.Code = A.UserID where [Stop] = 0
